title: 6.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
The daily attendance record of students in the month of September is given here.

Summary of this record is added as shown below.

Open this file.go.qubitscs.com/PHGi
Copy the data to a new sheet using the Move or Copy option and rename the sheet as Attendance - October.
1. Freeze the panes as in the worksheet Attendance - September .
2. Change the date and day with respect to the month of October. Also modify the data.
3. Edit the formulas according to the new data.
4. In the summary report, sort the data according to the student's name.
5. Edit the formulas

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
